title: Ferguson Residents' Mixed Emotions About DOJ Probe
teaser: In the weeks since Michael Brown's death, many St. Louis County residents have come forward with stories of racial profiling and harassment by predominantly white police forces.
contentencoded:
The Justice Department will soon begin an investigation into discriminatory policing practices by the Ferguson Police Department. In the weeks since Michael Brown's death, many St. Louis County residents have come forward with stories of racial profiling and harassment by predominantly white police forces.
